name: Run Cried the Crawling
description:
Run Cried the Crawling is a text based game set in a world in which humanity inhabits giant trees. This fantasy interactive fiction follows you, the heir of Tree Ledici,  as you are tasked with completing a pilgrimage to legitimize your claim. To become the next ruler you must complete the Path, venturing into the darkness below the branches to forge a connection with the mysterious gods that inhabit the ground. You are accompanied by a group of allies, some more trustworthy than others. 

Will you be able to complete your journey?

Will you discover the secrets your companions keep?

Will you discover the truth behind your father's reign?

May we rest in kindred, Dukeling.

The game includes character customization, including gender and appearance. For any questions about the development please refer to my tumblr.
